Name: Bulbasaur
Pokedex: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.

Name: Ivysaur
Pokedex: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.

Name: Venusaur
Pokedex: After a rainy day, the flower on its back smells stronger. The scent attracts other Pokémon.

Name: Charmander
Pokedex: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

Name: Charmeleon
Pokedex: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the air temperature to unbearably high levels.

Name: Charizard
Pokedex: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

Name: Squirtle
Pokedex: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

Name: Wartortle
Pokedex: It is said to live 10,000 years. Its furry tail is popular as a symbol of longevity.

Name: Blastoise
Pokedex: The pressurized water jets on this brutal Pokémon's shell are used for high-speed tackles.

Name: Caterpie
Pokedex: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.

Name: Metapod
Pokedex: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

Name: Butterfree
Pokedex: The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this Pokémon can fly about even in rain.

Name: Weedle
Pokedex: Its poison stinger is very powerful. Its bright-colored body is intended to warn off its enemies.

Name: Kakuna
Pokedex: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

Name: Beedrill
Pokedex: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

Name: Pidgey
Pokedex: It is docile and prefers to avoid conflict. If disturbed, however, it can ferociously strike back.

Name: Pidgeotto
Pokedex: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.

Name: Pidgeot
Pokedex: It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.

Name: Rattata
Pokedex: Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down.

Name: Raticate
Pokedex: The webs on its hind legs enable it to cross rivers. It searches wide areas for food.

Name: Spearow
Pokedex: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

Name: Fearow
Pokedex: It has the stamina to fly all day on its broad wings. It fights by using its sharp beak.

Name: Ekans
Pokedex: Moving silently and stealthily, it eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.

Name: Arbok
Pokedex: To intimidate foes, it spreads its chest wide and makes eerie sounds by expelling air from its mouth.

Name: Pikachu
Pokedex: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.

Name: Raichu
Pokedex: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.

Name: Sandshrew
Pokedex: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.

Name: Sandslash
Pokedex: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

Name: Nidoran
Pokedex: Small and very docile, it protects itself with its small, poisonous horn when attacked.

Name: Nidorina
Pokedex: When feeding its young, it first chews the food into a paste, then spits it out for the offspring.

Name: Nidoqueen
Pokedex: The body is covered by stiff, needlelike scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.

Name: Nidoran
Pokedex: Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered.

Name: Nidorino
Pokedex: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

Name: Nidoking
Pokedex: One swing of its mighty tail can snap a telephone pole as if it were a matchstick.

Name: Clefairy
Pokedex: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.

Name: Clefable
Pokedex: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

Name: Vulpix
Pokedex: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

Name: Ninetales
Pokedex: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

Name: Jigglypuff
Pokedex: If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.

Name: Wigglytuff
Pokedex: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

Name: Zubat
Pokedex: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echolocation to flit about in darkness.

Name: Golbat
Pokedex: Once it starts sucking blood, it does not stop until it is full. It flies at night in search of prey.

Name: Oddish
Pokedex: Its scientific name is "Oddium Wanderus." At night, it is said to walk nearly 1,000 feet on its two roots.

Name: Gloom
Pokedex: The honey it drools from its mouth smells so atrocious, it can curl noses more than a mile away.

Name: Vileplume
Pokedex: It has the world's largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

Name: Paras
Pokedex: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

Name: Parasect
Pokedex: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.

Name: Venonat
Pokedex: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.

Name: Venomoth
Pokedex: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.

Name: Diglett
Pokedex: Its skin is very thin. If it is exposed to light, its blood heats up, causing it to grow weak.

Name: Dugtrio
Pokedex: Extremely powerful, they can dig through even the hardest ground to a depth of over 60 miles.

Name: Meowth
Pokedex: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

Name: Persian
Pokedex: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.

Name: Psyduck
Pokedex: It has mystical powers but doesn't recall that it has used them. That is why it always looks puzzled.

Name: Golduck
Pokedex: The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.

Name: Mankey
Pokedex: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.

Name: Primeape
Pokedex: It is always outrageously furious. If it gives chase, it will tenaciously track the target no matter how far.

Name: Growlithe
Pokedex: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

Name: Arcanine
Pokedex: Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of majesty. Anyone hearing it can't help but grovel before it.

Name: Poliwag
Pokedex: The direction of the spiral on the belly differs by area. It is more adept at swimming than walking.

Name: Poliwhirl
Pokedex: Its two legs are well developed. Even though it can live on the ground, it prefers living in water.

Name: Poliwrath
Pokedex: A swimmer adept at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

Name: Abra
Pokedex: It senses impending attacks and teleports away to safety before the actual attacks can strike.

Name: Kadabra
Pokedex: If it uses its abilities, it emits special alpha waves that cause machines to malfunction.

Name: Alakazam
Pokedex: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its IQ (intelligence quotient) is said to be around 5,000.

Name: Machop
Pokedex: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

Name: Machoke
Pokedex: It can lift a dump truck with one hand. Using that power, it helps people with heavy jobs.

Name: Machamp
Pokedex: It uses its four powerful arms to pin the limbs of its foe, then throws the victim over the horizon.

Name: Bellsprout
Pokedex: Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary mandrake plant.

Name: Weepinbell
Pokedex: It spits out Poison Powder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of Acid.

Name: Victreebel
Pokedex: Once ingested into this Pokémon's body, even the hardest object will melt into nothing.

Name: Tentacool
Pokedex: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by their stingers.

Name: Tentacruel
Pokedex: It has 80 tentacles that move about freely. They can sting, causing poisoning and sharp, stabbing pain.

Name: Geodude
Pokedex: It is impossible to distinguish from rocks. It slams against others in contests of hardness.

Name: Graveler
Pokedex: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

Name: Golem
Pokedex: Even dynamite can't harm its hard, boulder-like body. It sheds its hide just once a year.

Name: Ponyta
Pokedex: Its legs grow strong while it chases after its parent. It runs in fields and mountains all day.

Name: Rapidash
Pokedex: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.

Name: Slowpoke
Pokedex: It lazes vacantly near water. If something bites its tail, it won't even notice for a whole day.

Name: Slowbro
Pokedex: When a Slowpoke went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a Shellder. That made it evolve into Slowbro.

Name: Magnemite
Pokedex: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges Thunder Wave and so on from the units at its sides.

Name: Magneton
Pokedex: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6 degrees Fahrenheit within 3,300 feet.

Name: Farfetch'd
Pokedex: It always walks about with a plant stalk clamped in its beak. The stalk is used for building its nest.

Name: Doduo
Pokedex: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

Name: Dodrio
Pokedex: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.

Name: Seel
Pokedex: Covered with light blue fur, its hide is thick and tough. It is active in bitter cold of -40 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Dewgong
Pokedex: Its streamlined body has little drag in water. The colder the temperature, the friskier it gets.

Name: Grimer
Pokedex: Appears in filthy areas. It thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

Name: Muk
Pokedex: A toxic fluid seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.

Name: Shellder
Pokedex: Clamping on to an opponent reveals its vulnerable parts, so it uses this move only as a last resort.

Name: Cloyster
Pokedex: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.

Name: Gastly
Pokedex: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

Name: Haunter
Pokedex: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim's life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.

Name: Gengar
Pokedex: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

Name: Onix
Pokedex: It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour.

Name: Drowzee
Pokedex: If you think that you had a good dream but you can't remember it, a Drowzee has probably eaten it.

Name: Hypno
Pokedex: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even in someone who just woke up.

Name: Krabby
Pokedex: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

Name: Kingler
Pokedex: Its pincers grow peculiarly large. If it lifts the pincers too fast, it loses its balance and staggers.

Name: Voltorb
Pokedex: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, it has zapped many people.

Name: Electrode
Pokedex: It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.

Name: Exeggcute
Pokedex: Even though it appears to be eggs of some sort, it was discovered to be a life-form more like plant seeds.

Name: Exeggutor
Pokedex: It is called "The Walking Jungle." If a head grows too big, it falls off and becomes an Exeggcute.

Name: Cubone
Pokedex: It always wears the skull of its dead mother, so no one has any idea what its hidden face looks like.

Name: Marowak
Pokedex: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

Name: Hitmonlee
Pokedex: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.

Name: Hitmonchan
Pokedex: The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this Pokémon. It throws punches that are faster than a bullet train.

Name: Lickitung
Pokedex: Its tongue is twice the length of its body. It can be moved like an arm for grabbing food and attacking.

Name: Koffing
Pokedex: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.

Name: Weezing
Pokedex: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small Koffing twins becoming conjoined as a Weezing.

Name: Rhyhorn
Pokedex: It is inept at turning because of its four short legs. It can only charge and run in one direction.

Name: Rhydon
Pokedex: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

Name: Chansey
Pokedex: It lays several eggs a day. The eggs are apparently rich in nutrients and extremely delicious.

Name: Tangela
Pokedex: It tangles any moving thing with its vines. Their subtle shaking is ticklish if you get ensnared.

Name: Kangaskhan
Pokedex: If it is safe, the young gets out of the belly pouch to play. The adult keeps a close eye on the youngster.

Name: Horsea
Pokedex: It makes its nest in the shade of corals. If it senses danger, it spits murky ink and flees.

Name: Seadra
Pokedex: It is capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its winglike pectoral fins and stout tail.

Name: Goldeen
Pokedex: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the water dancer.

Name: Seaking
Pokedex: It makes its nest by hollowing out boulders in streams with its horn. It defends its eggs with its life.

Name: Staryu
Pokedex: It appears in large numbers by seashores. At night, its central core flashes with a red light.

Name: Starmie
Pokedex: At the center of its body is a red core, which sends mysterious radio signals into the night sky.

Name: Mr. Mime
Pokedex: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.

Name: Scyther
Pokedex: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.

Name: Jynx
Pokedex: It speaks using a language that sounds human. Research is under way to determine what is being said.

Name: Electabuzz
Pokedex: It loves to feed on strong electricity. It occasionally appears around large power plants and so on.

Name: Magmar
Pokedex: Born in the spout of a volcano, its body is covered by flames that shimmer like the sun.

Name: Pinsir
Pokedex: It swings its long pincer horns wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.

Name: Tauros
Pokedex: When it is about to tackle, it whips its body repeatedly with its three long tails.

Name: Magikarp
Pokedex: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

Name: Gyarados
Pokedex: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

Name: Lapras
Pokedex: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.

Name: Ditto
Pokedex: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.

Name: Eevee
Pokedex: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokémon conceals many different possible evolutions.

Name: Vaporeon
Pokedex: It has evolved to be suitable for an aquatic life. It can invisibly melt away into water.

Name: Jolteon
Pokedex: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

Name: Flareon
Pokedex: It has a flame bag inside its body. After inhaling deeply, it blows out flames of nearly 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Porygon
Pokedex: A Pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. It is capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

Name: Omanyte
Pokedex: Revived from an ancient fossil, this Pokémon uses air stored in its shell to sink and rise in water.

Name: Omastar
Pokedex: Once wrapped around its prey, it never lets go. It eats the prey by tearing at it with sharp fangs.

Name: Kabuto
Pokedex: This Pokémon was regenerated from the fossil of an ancient creature. It protects itself with a hard shell.

Name: Kabutops
Pokedex: A slim and fast swimmer. It slices its prey with its sharp sickles and drinks the body fluids.

Name: Aerodactyl
Pokedex: This vicious Pokémon is said to have flown in ancient skies while shrieking high-pitched cries.

Name: Snorlax
Pokedex: Its stomach can digest any kind of food, even if it happens to be moldy or rotten.

Name: Articuno
Pokedex: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

Name: Zapdos
Pokedex: A legendary Pokémon that is said to live in thunderclouds. It freely controls lightning bolts.

Name: Moltres
Pokedex: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.

Name: Dratini
Pokedex: This Pokémon is full of life energy. It continually sheds its skin and grows steadily larger.

Name: Dragonair
Pokedex: A mystical Pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. It is said to have the ability to change the weather.

Name: Dragonite
Pokedex: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.

Name: Mewtwo
Pokedex: A Pokémon created by recombining Mew's genes. It's said to have the most savage heart among Pokémon.

Name: Mew
Pokedex: Its DNA is said to contain the genetic codes of all Pokémon, so it can use all kinds of techniques.

Name: Chikorita
Pokedex: It uses the leaf on its head to determine the temperature and humidity. It loves to sunbathe.

Name: Bayleef
Pokedex: The buds that ring its neck give off a spicy aroma that perks people up.

Name: Meganium
Pokedex: Meganium's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.

Name: Cyndaquil
Pokedex: It has a timid nature. If it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.

Name: Quilava
Pokedex: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.

Name: Typhlosion
Pokedex: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.

Name: Totodile
Pokedex: Its powerful, well-developed jaws are capable of crushing anything. Even its Trainer must be careful.

Name: Croconaw
Pokedex: Once it bites down, it won't let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.

Name: Feraligatr
Pokedex: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

Name: Sentret
Pokedex: It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.

Name: Furret
Pokedex: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other Pokémon to enter.

Name: Hoothoot
Pokedex: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

Name: Noctowl
Pokedex: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

Name: Ledyba
Pokedex: It is timid and clusters together with others. The fluid secreted by its feet indicates its location.

Name: Ledian
Pokedex: The spot patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.

Name: Spinarak
Pokedex: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

Name: Ariados
Pokedex: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.

Name: Crobat
Pokedex: Having four wings allows it to fly more quickly and quietly so it can sneak up on prey without its noticing.

Name: Chinchou
Pokedex: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.

Name: Lanturn
Pokedex: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light. With the prey incapacitated, the Pokémon swallows it in a single gulp.

Name: Pichu
Pokedex: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

Name: Cleffa
Pokedex: Many appear when the night skies are filled with shooting stars. They disappear with sunrise.

Name: Igglybuff
Pokedex: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

Name: Togepi
Pokedex: A proverb claims that happiness will come to anyone who can make a sleeping Togepi stand up.

Name: Togetic
Pokedex: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

Name: Natu
Pokedex: It usually forages for food on the ground but may, on rare occasions, hop onto branches to peck at shoots.

Name: Xatu
Pokedex: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.

Name: Mareep
Pokedex: It stores lots of air in its soft fur, allowing it to stay cool in summer and warm in winter.

Name: Flaaffy
Pokedex: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fires hair that zaps on impact.

Name: Ampharos
Pokedex: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

Name: Bellossom
Pokedex: When the heavy rainfall season ends, it is drawn out by warm sunlight to dance in the open.

Name: Marill
Pokedex: The tip of its tail is filled with oil that is lighter than water, so it acts as a float.

Name: Azumarill
Pokedex: The bubble-like pattern on its stomach helps it camouflage itself when it's in the water.

Name: Sudowoodo
Pokedex: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.

Name: Politoed
Pokedex: If Poliwag and Poliwhirl hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.

Name: Hoppip
Pokedex: It drifts on winds. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields and mountains, spring is on the way.

Name: Skiploom
Pokedex: It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight. It also floats in the air to get closer to the sun.

Name: Jumpluff
Pokedex: Even in the fiercest wind, it can control its fluff to make its way to any place in the world it wants.

Name: Aipom
Pokedex: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.

Name: Sunkern
Pokedex: It lives by drinking only dewdrops from under the leaves of plants. It is said that it eats nothing else.

Name: Sunflora
Pokedex: It gets energy from warm sunlight and is known for its habit of moving in pursuit of it.

Name: Yanma
Pokedex: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.

Name: Wooper
Pokedex: When the temperature cools in the evening, they emerge from water to seek food along the shore.

Name: Quagsire
Pokedex: This carefree Pokémon has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.

Name: Espeon
Pokedex: Its fur is so sensitive, it can feel minute shifts in the air and predict the weather...and its foes' thoughts.

Name: Umbreon
Pokedex: When exposed to the moon's aura, the rings on its body glow faintly and it's filled with a mysterious power.

Name: Murkrow
Pokedex: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

Name: Slowking
Pokedex: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

Name: Misdreavus
Pokedex: It likes playing mischievous tricks, such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.

Name: Unown
Pokedex: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or Unown came first.

Name: Wobbuffet
Pokedex: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

Name: Girafarig
Pokedex: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent by biting.

Name: Pineco
Pokedex: It looks just like a pinecone. Its shell protects it from bird Pokémon that peck it by mistake.

Name: Forretress
Pokedex: It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.

Name: Dunsparce
Pokedex: It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.

Name: Gligar
Pokedex: It flies straight at its target's face, then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.

Name: Steelix
Pokedex: It chews its way through boulders with its sturdy jaws. Its eyes can see in the darkness underground.

Name: Snubbull
Pokedex: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.

Name: Granbull
Pokedex: It can make most any Pokémon run away simply by opening its mouth wide to reveal its big fangs.

Name: Qwilfish
Pokedex: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They inject a toxin that causes fainting.

Name: Scizor
Pokedex: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.

Name: Shuckle
Pokedex: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

Name: Heracross
Pokedex: With its Herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.

Name: Sneasel
Pokedex: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.

Name: Teddiursa
Pokedex: Before food becomes scarce in wintertime, its habit is to hoard food in many hidden locations.

Name: Ursaring
Pokedex: Although it has a large body, it is quite skilled at climbing trees. It eats and sleeps in the treetops.

Name: Slugma
Pokedex: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

Name: Magcargo
Pokedex: Its body is as hot as lava and is always billowing. Flames will occasionally burst from its shell.

Name: Swinub
Pokedex: If it smells something enticing, it dashes off headlong to find the source of the aroma.

Name: Piloswine
Pokedex: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

Name: Corsola
Pokedex: They prefer unpolluted southern seas. Their coral branches lose their color and deteriorate in dirty water.

Name: Remoraid
Pokedex: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a Mantine's underside to scavenge for leftovers.

Name: Octillery
Pokedex: It traps foes with the suction cups on its tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

Name: Delibird
Pokedex: It carries food all day long. When someone is lost in the mountains, it shares that food.

Name: Mantine
Pokedex: While elegantly swimming in the sea, it ignores Remoraid that cling to its fins seeking food scraps.

Name: Skarmory
Pokedex: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.

Name: Houndour
Pokedex: To corner prey, they check each other's location using barks that only they can understand.

Name: Houndoom
Pokedex: The flames it breathes when angry contain toxins. If they cause a burn, it will hurt forever.

Name: Kingdra
Pokedex: It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths at which no other life-forms can survive.

Name: Phanpy
Pokedex: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.

Name: Donphan
Pokedex: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow.

Name: Porygon2
Pokedex: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.

Name: Stantler
Pokedex: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.

Name: Smeargle
Pokedex: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

Name: Tyrogue
Pokedex: To brush up on its fighting skills, it will challenge anyone. It has a very strong competitive spirit.

Name: Hitmontop
Pokedex: If you are enchanted by its smooth, dance-like kicks, you may get a closer experience with one than you'd like.

Name: Smoochum
Pokedex: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.

Name: Elekid
Pokedex: Spinning its arms around to generate electricity makes the area between its horns shine light blue.

Name: Magby
Pokedex: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body's heat can top 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Miltank
Pokedex: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.

Name: Blissey
Pokedex: This kindhearted Pokémon nurses sick Pokémon to health. It senses feelings of sadness.

Name: Raikou
Pokedex: This rough Pokémon stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity.

Name: Entei
Pokedex: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.

Name: Suicune
Pokedex: Said to be the embodiment of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.

Name: Larvitar
Pokedex: Born deep underground, it comes aboveground and becomes a pupa once it has finished eating the surrounding soil.

Name: Pupitar
Pokedex: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its thrashing can topple a mountain.

Name: Tyranitar
Pokedex: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.

Name: Lugia
Pokedex: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.

Name: Ho-Oh
Pokedex: It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted Trainer by shining its bright, rainbow-colored wings.

Name: Celebi
Pokedex: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.

Name: Treecko
Pokedex: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.

Name: Grovyle
Pokedex: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.

Name: Sceptile
Pokedex: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.

Name: Torchic
Pokedex: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Combusken
Pokedex: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.

Name: Blaziken
Pokedex: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.

Name: Mudkip
Pokedex: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

Name: Marshtomp
Pokedex: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.

Name: Swampert
Pokedex: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

Name: Poochyena
Pokedex: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.

Name: Mightyena
Pokedex: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.

Name: Zigzagoon
Pokedex: A Pokémon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigzags.

Name: Linoone
Pokedex: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

Name: Wurmple
Pokedex: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.

Name: Silcoon
Pokedex: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.

Name: Beautifly
Pokedex: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.

Name: Cascoon
Pokedex: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.

Name: Dustox
Pokedex: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.

Name: Lotad
Pokedex: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

Name: Lombre
Pokedex: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.

Name: Ludicolo
Pokedex: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.

Name: Seedot
Pokedex: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.

Name: Nuzleaf
Pokedex: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.

Name: Shiftry
Pokedex: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 feet per second that can level houses.

Name: Taillow
Pokedex: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.

Name: Swellow
Pokedex: It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.

Name: Wingull
Pokedex: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.

Name: Pelipper
Pokedex: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.

Name: Ralts
Pokedex: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

Name: Kirlia
Pokedex: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

Name: Gardevoir
Pokedex: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.

Name: Surskit
Pokedex: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.

Name: Masquerain
Pokedex: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction--to and fro and sideways.

Name: Shroomish
Pokedex: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.

Name: Breloom
Pokedex: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.

Name: Slakoth
Pokedex: If it eats just three leaves in a day, it is satisfied. Other than that, it sleeps for 20 hours a day.

Name: Vigoroth
Pokedex: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.

Name: Slaking
Pokedex: It is the world's most slothful Pokémon. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.

Name: Nincada
Pokedex: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.

Name: Ninjask
Pokedex: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

Name: Shedinja
Pokedex: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.

Name: Whismur
Pokedex: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.

Name: Loudred
Pokedex: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.

Name: Exploud
Pokedex: Its roar in battle shakes the ground like a tremor--or like an earthquake has struck.

Name: Makuhita
Pokedex: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.

Name: Hariyama
Pokedex: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.

Name: Azurill
Pokedex: It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.

Name: Nosepass
Pokedex: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.

Name: Skitty
Pokedex: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.

Name: Delcatty
Pokedex: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.

Name: Sableye
Pokedex: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.

Name: Mawile
Pokedex: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

Name: Aron
Pokedex: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that covered its whole body and develops a new one.

Name: Lairon
Pokedex: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.

Name: Aggron
Pokedex: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.

Name: Meditite
Pokedex: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.

Name: Medicham
Pokedex: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe's next move.

Name: Electrike
Pokedex: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

Name: Manectric
Pokedex: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.

Name: Plusle
Pokedex: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts out its body to create crackling noises.

Name: Minun
Pokedex: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.

Name: Volbeat
Pokedex: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.

Name: Illumise
Pokedex: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.

Name: Roselia
Pokedex: Roselia that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.

Name: Gulpin
Pokedex: There is nothing its stomach can't digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.

Name: Swalot
Pokedex: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.

Name: Carvanha
Pokedex: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

Name: Sharpedo
Pokedex: It can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.

Name: Wailmer
Pokedex: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes with great force.

Name: Wailord
Pokedex: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.

Name: Numel
Pokedex: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.

Name: Camerupt
Pokedex: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.

Name: Torkoal
Pokedex: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

Name: Spoink
Pokedex: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.

Name: Grumpig
Pokedex: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.

Name: Spinda
Pokedex: The chances of two Spinda having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.

Name: Trapinch
Pokedex: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

Name: Vibrava
Pokedex: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.

Name: Flygon
Pokedex: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.

Name: Cacnea
Pokedex: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

Name: Cacturne
Pokedex: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.

Name: Swablu
Pokedex: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

Name: Altaria
Pokedex: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.

Name: Zangoose
Pokedex: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.

Name: Seviper
Pokedex: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It's Zangoose's archrival.

Name: Lunatone
Pokedex: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.

Name: Solrock
Pokedex: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.

Name: Barboach
Pokedex: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.

Name: Whiscash
Pokedex: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything--if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.

Name: Corphish
Pokedex: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.

Name: Crawdaunt
Pokedex: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.

Name: Baltoy
Pokedex: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

Name: Claydol
Pokedex: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.

Name: Lileep
Pokedex: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.

Name: Cradily
Pokedex: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.

Name: Anorith
Pokedex: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.

Name: Armaldo
Pokedex: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.

Name: Feebas
Pokedex: It is the shabbiest Pokémon of all. It forms in schools and lives at the bottom of rivers.

Name: Milotic
Pokedex: It is the world's most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.

Name: Castform
Pokedex: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.

Name: Kecleon
Pokedex: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.

Name: Shuppet
Pokedex: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.

Name: Banette
Pokedex: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

Name: Duskull
Pokedex: If it finds bad children who won't listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it's said.

Name: Dusclops
Pokedex: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.

Name: Tropius
Pokedex: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It's a highly favored tropical snack.

Name: Chimecho
Pokedex: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.

Name: Absol
Pokedex: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.

Name: Wynaut
Pokedex: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.

Name: Snorunt
Pokedex: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.

Name: Glalie
Pokedex: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.

Name: Spheal
Pokedex: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.

Name: Sealeo
Pokedex: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.

Name: Walrein
Pokedex: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.

Name: Clamperl
Pokedex: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.

Name: Huntail
Pokedex: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

Name: Gorebyss
Pokedex: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.

Name: Relicanth
Pokedex: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

Name: Luvdisc
Pokedex: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.

Name: Bagon
Pokedex: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

Name: Shelgon
Pokedex: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.

Name: Salamence
Pokedex: It's uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.

Name: Beldum
Pokedex: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

Name: Metang
Pokedex: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its two brains are linked, amplifying its psychic power.

Name: Metagross
Pokedex: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

Name: Regirock
Pokedex: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.

Name: Regice
Pokedex: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Registeel
Pokedex: Its body is said to be harder than any kind of metal. A study has revealed that its body is hollow.

Name: Latias
Pokedex: It can telepathically communicate with people. It changes its appearance using its down that refracts light.

Name: Latios
Pokedex: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that dislikes fighting.

Name: Kyogre
Pokedex: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.

Name: Groudon
Pokedex: This legendary Pokémon is said to represent the land. It went to sleep after dueling Kyogre.

Name: Rayquaza
Pokedex: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.

Name: Jirachi
Pokedex: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.

Name: Deoxys
Pokedex: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.

Name: Turtwig
Pokedex: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.

Name: Grotle
Pokedex: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

Name: Torterra
Pokedex: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

Name: Chimchar
Pokedex: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

Name: Monferno
Pokedex: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.

Name: Infernape
Pokedex: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.

Name: Piplup
Pokedex: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

Name: Prinplup
Pokedex: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.

Name: Empoleon
Pokedex: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

Name: Starly
Pokedex: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

Name: Staravia
Pokedex: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.

Name: Staraptor
Pokedex: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

Name: Bidoof
Pokedex: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

Name: Bibarel
Pokedex: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

Name: Kricketot
Pokedex: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.

Name: Kricketune
Pokedex: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.

Name: Shinx
Pokedex: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

Name: Luxio
Pokedex: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

Name: Luxray
Pokedex: Luxray's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.

Name: Budew
Pokedex: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

Name: Roserade
Pokedex: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.

Name: Cranidos
Pokedex: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.

Name: Rampardos
Pokedex: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.

Name: Shieldon
Pokedex: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.

Name: Bastiodon
Pokedex: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

Name: Burmy
Pokedex: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

Name: Wormadam
Pokedex: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon's body. The cloak is never shed.

Name: Mothim
Pokedex: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

Name: Combee
Pokedex: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

Name: Vespiquen
Pokedex: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.

Name: Pachirisu
Pokedex: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

Name: Buizel
Pokedex: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.

Name: Floatzel
Pokedex: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.

Name: Cherubi
Pokedex: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.

Name: Cherrim
Pokedex: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.

Name: Shellos
Pokedex: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.

Name: Gastrodon
Pokedex: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.

Name: Ambipom
Pokedex: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

Name: Drifloon
Pokedex: These Pokémon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.

Name: Drifblim
Pokedex: It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

Name: Buneary
Pokedex: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.

Name: Lopunny
Pokedex: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

Name: Mismagius
Pokedex: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

Name: Honchkrow
Pokedex: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.

Name: Glameow
Pokedex: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.

Name: Purugly
Pokedex: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

Name: Chingling
Pokedex: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

Name: Stunky
Pokedex: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

Name: Skuntank
Pokedex: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

Name: Bronzor
Pokedex: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

Name: Bronzong
Pokedex: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.

Name: Bonsly
Pokedex: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

Name: Mime Jr.
Pokedex: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

Name: Happiny
Pokedex: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It's bothered by how curly its hair looks.

Name: Chatot
Pokedex: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

Name: Spiritomb
Pokedex: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.

Name: Gible
Pokedex: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

Name: Gabite
Pokedex: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.

Name: Garchomp
Pokedex: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.

Name: Munchlax
Pokedex: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.

Name: Riolu
Pokedex: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

Name: Lucario
Pokedex: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

Name: Hippopotas
Pokedex: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.

Name: Hippowdon
Pokedex: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

Name: Skorupi
Pokedex: It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject its prey with a savage poison.

Name: Drapion
Pokedex: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

Name: Croagunk
Pokedex: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

Name: Toxicroak
Pokedex: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

Name: Carnivine
Pokedex: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

Name: Finneon
Pokedex: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.

Name: Lumineon
Pokedex: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.

Name: Mantyke
Pokedex: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.

Name: Snover
Pokedex: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.

Name: Abomasnow
Pokedex: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

Name: Weavile
Pokedex: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.

Name: Magnezone
Pokedex: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.

Name: Lickilicky
Pokedex: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.

Name: Rhyperior
Pokedex: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.

Name: Tangrowth
Pokedex: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can't even see its eyes.

Name: Electivire
Pokedex: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

Name: Magmortar
Pokedex: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

Name: Togekiss
Pokedex: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another's rights and avoid needless strife.

Name: Yanmega
Pokedex: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.

Name: Leafeon
Pokedex: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.

Name: Glaceon
Pokedex: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

Name: Gliscor
Pokedex: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.

Name: Mamoswine
Pokedex: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

Name: Porygon-Z
Pokedex: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error...

Name: Gallade
Pokedex: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

Name: Probopass
Pokedex: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.

Name: Dusknoir
Pokedex: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

Name: Froslass
Pokedex: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass.

Name: Rotom
Pokedex: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

Name: Uxie
Pokedex: It is said that its emergence gave humans the intelligence to improve their quality of life.

Name: Mesprit
Pokedex: It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to leave its body to fly on the lake's surface.

Name: Azelf
Pokedex: It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit, and Azelf all came from the same egg.

Name: Dialga
Pokedex: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

Name: Palkia
Pokedex: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

Name: Heatran
Pokedex: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.

Name: Regigigas
Pokedex: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

Name: Giratina
Pokedex: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.

Name: Cresselia
Pokedex: Those who sleep holding Cresselia's feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

Name: Phione
Pokedex: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

Name: Manaphy
Pokedex: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.

Name: Darkrai
Pokedex: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

Name: Shaymin
Pokedex: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.

Name: Arceus
Pokedex: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born before the universe even existed.

Name: Victini
Pokedex: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.

Name: Snivy
Pokedex: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.

Name: Servine
Pokedex: When it gets dirty, its leaves can't be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.

Name: Serperior
Pokedex: It can stop its opponents' movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

Name: Tepig
Pokedex: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.

Name: Pignite
Pokedex: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

Name: Emboar
Pokedex: It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves. It grows a beard of fire.

Name: Oshawott
Pokedex: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

Name: Dewott
Pokedex: As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns different forms for using the scalchops.

Name: Samurott
Pokedex: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

Name: Patrat
Pokedex: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.

Name: Watchog
Pokedex: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.

Name: Lillipup
Pokedex: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it's also smart enough to check its foe's strength and avoid battle.

Name: Herdier
Pokedex: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.

Name: Stoutland
Pokedex: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.

Name: Purrloin
Pokedex: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can't help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

Name: Liepard
Pokedex: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.

Name: Pansage
Pokedex: It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.

Name: Simisage
Pokedex: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

Name: Pansear
Pokedex: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Simisear
Pokedex: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.

Name: Panpour
Pokedex: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

Name: Simipour
Pokedex: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.

Name: Munna
Pokedex: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.

Name: Musharna
Pokedex: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.

Name: Pidove
Pokedex: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.

Name: Tranquill
Pokedex: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.

Name: Unfezant
Pokedex: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.

Name: Blitzle
Pokedex: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.

Name: Zebstrika
Pokedex: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

Name: Roggenrola
Pokedex: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.

Name: Boldore
Pokedex: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.

Name: Gigalith
Pokedex: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.

Name: Woobat
Pokedex: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.

Name: Swoobat
Pokedex: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.

Name: Drilbur
Pokedex: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.

Name: Excadrill
Pokedex: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.

Name: Audino
Pokedex: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

Name: Timburr
Pokedex: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

Name: Gurdurr
Pokedex: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

Name: Conkeldurr
Pokedex: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.

Name: Tympole
Pokedex: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.

Name: Palpitoad
Pokedex: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.

Name: Seismitoad
Pokedex: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

Name: Throh
Pokedex: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.

Name: Sawk
Pokedex: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.

Name: Sewaddle
Pokedex: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

Name: Swadloon
Pokedex: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

Name: Leavanny
Pokedex: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

Name: Venipede
Pokedex: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

Name: Whirlipede
Pokedex: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.

Name: Scolipede
Pokedex: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

Name: Cottonee
Pokedex: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.

Name: Whimsicott
Pokedex: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

Name: Petilil
Pokedex: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.

Name: Lilligant
Pokedex: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.

Name: Basculin
Pokedex: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school.

Name: Sandile
Pokedex: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.

Name: Krokorok
Pokedex: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.

Name: Krookodile
Pokedex: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

Name: Darumaka
Pokedex: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Darmanitan
Pokedex: Its internal fire burns at 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

Name: Maractus
Pokedex: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.

Name: Dwebble
Pokedex: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.

Name: Crustle
Pokedex: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.

Name: Scraggy
Pokedex: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.

Name: Scrafty
Pokedex: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.

Name: Sigilyph
Pokedex: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.

Name: Yamask
Pokedex: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

Name: Cofagrigus
Pokedex: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.

Name: Tirtouga
Pokedex: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

Name: Carracosta
Pokedex: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.

Name: Archen
Pokedex: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.

Name: Archeops
Pokedex: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.

Name: Trubbish
Pokedex: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

Name: Garbodor
Pokedex: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.

Name: Zorua
Pokedex: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.

Name: Zoroark
Pokedex: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

Name: Minccino
Pokedex: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.

Name: Cinccino
Pokedex: Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.

Name: Gothita
Pokedex: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.

Name: Gothorita
Pokedex: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.

Name: Gothitelle
Pokedex: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.

Name: Solosis
Pokedex: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

Name: Duosion
Pokedex: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.

Name: Reuniclus
Pokedex: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

Name: Ducklett
Pokedex: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.

Name: Swanna
Pokedex: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

Name: Vanillite
Pokedex: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.

Name: Vanillish
Pokedex: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

Name: Vanilluxe
Pokedex: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.

Name: Deerling
Pokedex: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon's fur. People use it to mark the seasons.

Name: Sawsbuck
Pokedex: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.

Name: Emolga
Pokedex: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

Name: Karrablast
Pokedex: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.

Name: Escavalier
Pokedex: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.

Name: Foongus
Pokedex: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases poison spores.

Name: Amoonguss
Pokedex: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.

Name: Frillish
Pokedex: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.

Name: Jellicent
Pokedex: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent's habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

Name: Alomomola
Pokedex: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.

Name: Joltik
Pokedex: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.

Name: Galvantula
Pokedex: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.

Name: Ferroseed
Pokedex: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.

Name: Ferrothorn
Pokedex: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.

Name: Klink
Pokedex: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.

Name: Klang
Pokedex: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn't return, it will die.

Name: Klinklang
Pokedex: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.

Name: Tynamo
Pokedex: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.

Name: Eelektrik
Pokedex: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.

Name: Eelektross
Pokedex: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.

Name: Elgyem
Pokedex: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.

Name: Beheeyem
Pokedex: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.

Name: Litwick
Pokedex: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

Name: Lampent
Pokedex: It arrives near the moment of death and steals spirit from the body.

Name: Chandelure
Pokedex: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.

Name: Axew
Pokedex: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.

Name: Fraxure
Pokedex: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.

Name: Haxorus
Pokedex: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.

Name: Cubchoo
Pokedex: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthy, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.

Name: Beartic
Pokedex: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.

Name: Cryogonal
Pokedex: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Shelmet
Pokedex: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.

Name: Accelgor
Pokedex: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.

Name: Stunfisk
Pokedex: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.

Name: Mienfoo
Pokedex: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.

Name: Mienshao
Pokedex: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.

Name: Druddigon
Pokedex: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.

Name: Golett
Pokedex: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.

Name: Golurk
Pokedex: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.

Name: Pawniard
Pokedex: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.

Name: Bisharp
Pokedex: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.

Name: Bouffalant
Pokedex: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.

Name: Rufflet
Pokedex: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.

Name: Braviary
Pokedex: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.

Name: Vullaby
Pokedex: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.

Name: Mandibuzz
Pokedex: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.

Name: Heatmor
Pokedex: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.

Name: Durant
Pokedex: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.

Name: Deino
Pokedex: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.

Name: Zweilous
Pokedex: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.

Name: Hydreigon
Pokedex: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!

Name: Larvesta
Pokedex: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.

Name: Volcarona
Pokedex: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.

Name: Cobalion
Pokedex: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.

Name: Terrakion
Pokedex: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.

Name: Virizion
Pokedex: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.

Name: Tornadus
Pokedex: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.

Name: Thundurus
Pokedex: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.

Name: Reshiram
Pokedex: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.

Name: Zekrom
Pokedex: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.

Name: Landorus
Pokedex: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.

Name: Kyurem
Pokedex: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.

Name: Keldeo
Pokedex: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.

Name: Meloetta
