Pokedex: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

Name: Genesect
Pokedex: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.

Name: Chespin
Pokedex: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.

Name: Quilladin
Pokedex: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights.

Name: Chesnaught
Pokedex: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

Name: Fennekin
Pokedex: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.

Name: Braixen
Pokedex: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.

Name: Delphox
Pokedex: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

Name: Froakie
Pokedex: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.

Name: Frogadier
Pokedex: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.

Name: Greninja
Pokedex: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.

Name: Bunnelby
Pokedex: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.

Name: Diggersby
Pokedex: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it's finished digging, it lounges lazily.

Name: Fletchling
Pokedex: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.

Name: Fletchinder
Pokedex: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.

Name: Talonflame
Pokedex: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.

Name: Scatterbug
Pokedex: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.

Name: Spewpa
Pokedex: The beaks of bird Pokémon can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.

Name: Vivillon
Pokedex: The patterns on this Pokémon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.

Name: Litleo
Pokedex: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick to fight.

Name: Pyroar
Pokedex: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride's cubs.

Name: Flabébé
Pokedex: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.

Name: Floette
Pokedex: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.

Name: Florges
Pokedex: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.

Name: Skiddo
Pokedex: If it has sunshine and water, it doesn't need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.

Name: Gogoat
Pokedex: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

Name: Pancham
Pokedex: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can't help grinning if anyone pats its head.

Name: Pangoro
Pokedex: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

Name: Furfrou
Pokedex: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.

Name: Espurr
Pokedex: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.

Name: Meowstic
Pokedex: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.

Name: Honedge
Pokedex: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.

Name: Doublade
Pokedex: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.

Name: Aegislash
Pokedex: Apparently, it can detect the innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.

Name: Spritzee
Pokedex: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.

Name: Aromatisse
Pokedex: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.

Name: Swirlix
Pokedex: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.

Name: Slurpuff
Pokedex: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human's, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It's like it can see with its nose!

Name: Inkay
Pokedex: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.

Name: Malamar
Pokedex: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.

Name: Binacle
Pokedex: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.

Name: Barbaracle
Pokedex: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.

Name: Skrelp
Pokedex: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.

Name: Dragalge
Pokedex: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.

Name: Clauncher
Pokedex: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.

Name: Clawitzer
Pokedex: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

Name: Helioptile
Pokedex: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

Name: Heliolisk
Pokedex: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

Name: Tyrunt
Pokedex: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.

Name: Tyrantrum
Pokedex: Nothing could stop this Pokémon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.

Name: Amaura
Pokedex: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

Name: Aurorus
Pokedex: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent's attack.

Name: Sylveon
Pokedex: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.

Name: Hawlucha
Pokedex: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.

Name: Dedenne
Pokedex: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

Name: Carbink
Pokedex: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It's occasionally found during the excavation of caves.

Name: Goomy
Pokedex: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.

Name: Sliggoo
Pokedex: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.

Name: Goodra
Pokedex: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that's the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.

Name: Klefki
Pokedex: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.

Name: Phantump
Pokedex: According to old tales, these Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.

Name: Trevenant
Pokedex: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.

Name: Pumpkaboo
Pokedex: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

Name: Gourgeist
Pokedex: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

Name: Bergmite
Pokedex: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.

Name: Avalugg
Pokedex: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.

Name: Noibat
Pokedex: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.

Name: Noivern
Pokedex: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.

Name: Xerneas
Pokedex: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

Name: Yveltal
Pokedex: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

Name: Zygarde
Pokedex: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.

Name: Diancie
Pokedex: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.

Name: Hoopa
Pokedex: It gathers things it likes and passes them through its loop to teleport them to a secret place.

Name: Volcanion
Pokedex: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
